document_data.name: Thaerma
document_data.mainbody: '''Thaerma''' was an individual working with or for the [[War Wizards]] at court in [[Cormyr]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Their skills almost certainly lay at healing.
document_data.Abilities: Thaerma was recommended by [[Huldyl Rauthur]] when he believed there may be lingering effects from magic attack, strongly implying she was either a healer or some sort of expert in lingering curses.
document_data.Relationships: Per [[Pheldemar]], the two of them had history, and he gave the implication of a grudge, or bad blood, between them.
document_data.History: [[Huldyl Rauthur]] commanded Pheldemar to seek Thaerma at court to determine whether the invaders had left any lingering effects on him before resting in the aftermath of the attack on [[Vangerdahast]]'s sanctum at [[Mouth o'Gargoyles]] in {{yearlink|1373}}.
